summary: The eldest daughter of a broken and troubled family works to keep the family together and look after her younger siblings, who are slipping into a life of crime.
cast: Lin Yang|Fan Yang|Shu-Fen Hsin|An-Shun Yu|Tien-Lu Li|Fu-Sheng Tsui|Shu-Fang Chen|Nien-Jen Wu|Vega Tsai|Chih-Cheng Hsueh|Jack Kao|Ju Lin
title: La hija del Nilo
